case.title: down to earth successful happy guy - 37 (london town)
case.text:
Hiya,
well what can i say , im a normal down to earth guy who enjoys and respects life. im 37, love my work and freinds. i enjoy dining out and going on short trips here and there, as im in the property business i enjoy visiting historical places and buildings of interest. im a good listener and considerate. im comtemporary enough to like cars and motorbikes but have traditional values like not allowing women to pay for things lol. right lets get to the point, i would love to to meet a date and eat, drink , discuss and debate about many subjects together and of course have a laugh while doing so.
please send me some photos and details of you.
Billy
